smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication

smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ArchiveDetails' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'ArchiveDao' with '33' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'BaseActivity' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AppCompatPreferenceActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ReaderActivity' with '23' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'ReaderTabHolder' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'ArchiveList' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SettingsActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ReaderFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'DatabaseReader' with '38' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'ArchiveDetailsFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ArchiveListFragment' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SubsamplingTarget' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface ArchiveDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class ReaderActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class DatabaseReader is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ArchiveListFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function generateSuggestionList is nested too deeply.
Function internalSearchServer is nested too deeply.
Function extractArchive is nested too deeply.
Function downloadArchiveList is nested too deeply.
Function internalFilter is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreateView is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: TopLevelPropertyNaming

instances.message: Top level constant names should match the pattern: [A-Z][_A-Z0-9]*

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (page in 0 until numPages) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: page in 0 until numPages
Parentheses in (-1..1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: -1..1
Parentheses in (term.length - 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: term.length - 2
Parentheses in (colonIndex in 0..(term.length - 2) && term[colonIndex + 1] == '"') are unnecessary and can be replaced with: colonIndex in 0..(term.length - 2) && term[colonIndex + 1] == '"'

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Archive contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called extract
The data class Archive contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called invalidateCache

The data class Archive contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called downloadPage
The data class Archive contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called containsTag
The data class Archive contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getTags

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class ArchiveJson defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.
